triage_summary: Todo class lacks __lt__ method for comparison. Adding comparison support to enable sorted() on Todo objects.

changes.description: Added __lt__ method to Todo class for sorting support
New test file with 6 tests for Todo comparison

verification_targets: Incomplete todos come before completed ones
Within same status, older created_at comes first
id used as tiebreaker when created_at is identical
risks: Edge case of same timestamps handled with id tiebreaker
